Description:
Sales Officer - RiyadhAbout This JobAt ABYAT, it's all about the customer! As a sales officer, you will be a key part of ABYAT's sales team, whether in the tiles, bath, lighting, or furniture departments. There, you will be one of the most important people on the floor, providing the best, most efficient service in the market.ResponsibilitiesAs an ABYAT Sales OfficerMaking sure your department is neat, priced, and stocked to give customers a positive shopping experience.
Acting as an expert on a range of home furnishing finishing solutions, products, and services such as home furniture, tiles, lighting, and bath installations to inspire, inform, and help the customer make the correct purchase.
Achieving your monthly sales targets.
Seeks opportunities for self-development and career advancement.Skills
Skills:
Your values reflect ABYAT's values.
2 years' experience in retail sales, must be in the home furnishing or finishing sectors
Must have background experience in home furnishing or finishing sector (tiles, bath, and lighting).
Quickly learns new technology.
Good communicator.
Focuses on results and achieving personal work objectives. Shows an understanding of the importance of the customer.

Data.Company Industry: Home & Office Furniture; Home Accessories & Decor
